name: Resume SPA
stacks: Vue 3 / Javascript / Html 5 / Bootstrap 5 / JSON / CSS 3
software_desc_1: This is the first application that I have built in VueJS. This application aims to show My experience, recent work & other professional information.

learn.content: Learned dynamic routing.
Worked with navigation guard feature.
Worked with componenets.
Learned lifecycle events.
Worked with functions & methods.
Data rendering from server side.
Forms data collection & validation using data binding & form submission using Axios package.
Deployment on production server.

name: LMS
stacks: Codeignitor / PHP / MySQL / jQuery / JSON / Html /  CSS / Bootstrap
software_desc_1: It's a customized Learning Management System with a lot of features like secure video streaming, social media logins, customized student enrollments for regular & In-house students, Call / SMS / Whatsapp / Email integrations, E-commerce features & much more.

learn.content: Integrated Social media API for login & registration (Google/LinkedIn/Facebook).
Integrated VdoCipher API for secure video streaming.
Integrated Twilio / Sendblue / Wati for SMS & calls.
Developed crud modules according to the client need.
Integrated E-commerce features from scratch like Buy Now, Payment Gateway, Notifications, Webhooks, etc.
Developed a detailed watch history of a student as per client need.
Maintaining this application from 2020 to till Now.

name: MLM & Ecommerce App
stacks: Codeignitor / PHP / MySQL / jQuery / JSON / Html /  CSS / Bootstrap
software_desc_1: A Multi-level Marketing Application that became a large scale E-commerce website with millions of database records.

learn.content: Developed crud modules that meets client requirement.
Wrote highly optimize queries that balance MySQL database tables.
Integrated ICICI payment gateway API.
Integrated Document verification APIs.
Developed an E-commerce website & connect with an MLM application.
It is the Large scale application of my career in which I have worked.

name: Chat App {Ecommerce}
stacks: Codeignitor / PHP / MySQL / jQuery / JSON / Html /  CSS / Bootstrap
software_desc_1: A social media buying & selling E-commerce application that is fully based on Chat.

learn.content: Learned & implemented web scraping to fetch users profile from Instagram, Facebook, Youtube, Telegram & twitter.
Developed single & group chatrooms.
Integrated ICICI payment gateway.
Integrated Stripe 2D payment gateway.
Developed crud modules that meets client requirement.

name: Billing Application
stacks: PHP / MySQL / jQuery / JSON / Html / CSS / Bootstrap
software_desc_1: A purchased billing application that is used to designed & developed as per the client's need.

learn.content: Developed crud modules for Recruitment companies.
Developed crud modules for Garment maker companies.
Developed crud modules for Retails stores1.
